Pre-Game Insights: Andre Russell will miss West Indies' three-match T20 International series against South Africa
Roston Chase has been named deputy to Rovman Powell
The West Indies vs South Africa series will mark the return of hard-hitting batter Shimron Hetmyer and spin-bowling allrounder Fabian Allen
Others: South Africa, who lost to India in the T20 World Cup final, have already named their squad for the series
The Proteas are also without some big names, including Quinton de Kock, Kagiso Rabada, Keshav Maharaj, Tabraiz Shamsi, and David Miller
Both South Africa's tour of West Indies 2024 and the Women's Caribbean Premier League 2024 will be streamed live on FanCode
